changelog:
- New NAVP/AIRG (Pathfinding) files to help NPC movement (Thanks to AtomicForce)
- NPCs should now hear through less walls (but still some walls)
- Peacock Plugin: Contract creation is now accessed via creation menu instead of destination (Thanks to Riisikumi)
- Can no longer get stuck inside armoury
- Converts raw file to SMF-friendly file to remove warning
- Moves lamps to boat rental window and turns them on at night
